entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character, who is buying a wand from Mr. Ollivander's shop.

entities.name: mr ollivander
entities.description: A wizard and the owner of the wand shop where Harry buys his wand.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: A student who is also buying a wand from Mr. Ollivander's shop.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Harry's gamekeeper and a wizard, who accompanies Harry to the wand shop.

entities.name: phoenix
entities.description: A mythical bird whose tail feather is used in Harry's wand.

relationships.description: Harry buys a wand from Mr. Ollivander's shop.
Both Harry and Krum are students buying wands from the same shop.
Mr. Ollivander knows Hagrid, who is accompanying Harry to the shop.
